thread.title: Mark Zuckerberg Delhi Town Hall: Facebook to tap startup boom in India with Nasscom tie up
thread.title_full: Mark Zuckerberg Delhi Town Hall: Facebook to tap startup boom in India with Nasscom tie up - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Mark Zuckerberg Delhi Town Hall: Facebook to tap startup boom in India with Nasscom tie up
text: Facebook recently conducted a town hall at its headquarters in Menlo Park, in which PM Narendra Modi had participated. Now, CEO Mark Zuckerberg posted on his Facebook Page that he is all set to host another town hall in Delhi on October 28. A lot is expected from Facebook, including its recent partnership with Nasscom to launch the ‘Leaders Building for the Next Billion Program.’ With the partnership, both companies aim towards supporting startups and developers to build websites and apps for first time Internet users. As per Nasscom, India is one of the five largest startup communities that have created over 80,000 jobs across more than 4,200 companies.
